Html:
I was trying to optimize my gear for all the gear available before patch 3.1 comes out.  My main problem was, holy light was 0% of my mana usage.  This is not realistic for me.  I was said I use it about 15 to 20% of the time.  How do I get RAWR to realize I do cast holy light? 

Other thoughts:
What do you mean by burst and fighting healing?
What do you mean by glyph of  holy light targets on the options tab?

It means with the fight options you put in you will only have enough mana to spam Flash of Light. This is most likely caused by you not selecting any buffs. If you still feel that this is wrong, you need to post your character xml file for me to be of any further help.
